pull.title: doc: add distcc to productivity notes
pull.body: If you have more than one computer at your disposal, you can use [distcc](https://www.distcc.org) to speed up compilation.

events.body: Interesting suggestion. Although general build speed-up tips are somewhat out of scope, I don't think it hurts to mention the fact that it exists. No need to add any more details though.
I think this is a bit too high-level / generic to add to our notes. Also not a fan of linking to stackoverflow posts for random ssh advice (I'd suggest people read the actual distcc documentation).
@fanquake good point, I'll drop that and actually do what `man distcc` says: give it the full path :-)
